CertificateArn.description: String that contains the ARN of the ACM Certificate with one or more tags that you want to remove. This must be of the form:  arn:aws:acm:region:123456789012:certificate/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012  For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and AWS Service Namespaces.

Tags.description: The key-value pair that defines the tag to remove.
